narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: British Armoured Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armoured exploitation force. Specialized in wide flanking movements, pursuit operations, and reconnaissance in force. 'Desert Rats' nickname earned through aggressive armoured warfare in North African campaign.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Coastal plain and rocky desert (Libyan Desert west of Tobruk)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Extended desert operations with minimal supply

environment.terrain_type: Coastal plain and rocky desert (Libyan Desert west of Tobruk)
